LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, age 32 days, mean length 20.3 mm, mean weight 0.107 g) 125 mg/L/96 hr (95% confidence limit: 110-142 mg/L); flow through, 24.9 °C, pH 7.5, hardness 48.3 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 43.5 mg/L CaCO3, dissolved oxygen 6.3 mg/L /99+% purity/

EC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, age 32 days, mean length 20.3 mm, mean weight 0.107 g) 96.9 mg/L/96 hr (95% confidence limit: 89.1-105 mg/L); flow through, 24.9 °C, pH 7.5, hardness 48.3 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 43.5 mg/L CaCO3, dissolved oxygen 6.3 mg/L; Effect: Affected fish lost schooling behavior, were hyperactive and overreactive to external stimuli, had increased respiration and convulsions. They also had rigid musculature and spinal column deformities along with hemorrhaging and dark coloration. Equilibrium loss was observed prior to death. /99+% purity/
